data.expected_result: You should still be able to view channel accordingly to the selected filter, i.e. filters should remain applied.
data.short_description: Channel filters reset when auto-rotating the screen in server settings>channels.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings>channels. - On top right, click on the filter button and in the "select sort mode" select anything (i.e. Category, Voice Channel, or Text channel). - Notice that channel list adjust accordingly after applying any of those filters. - Auto-rotate your screen.
